text: The Polish Rhythmic Gymnastics Championships (pl. Mistrzostwa Polski w gimnastyce artystycznej) are a rhythmic gymnastics competition held annually to determine the national medalists of Poland. The event has been held annually since 1955. The separate competitions are held individually, in groups and in teams, for all the age categories. == Medalists == ===Senior medalists in individual all-around=== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan=6 align=center | All-around senior medalists Senior Gold Medalists, Pick: Wielobój |- !
